name: Vegan Minestrone - Veggies Pasta & White Bean Soup
description: Vegan Minestrone - White Bean Soup with Elbows, Veggies, Basil and vegan parmesan. Can be gluten-free, nut-free. Soy-free Vegan Dairy-free Recipe

video.name: Minestrone - 1 Pot | Vegan Richa
video.description:
Hearty Minestrone. Easy 1 Pot Dinner!
RECIPE : http://www.veganricha.com/2016/12/vegan-minestrone-white-bean-soup.html

White Bean Soup with Elbows, Veggies, Fresh Basil and Vegan Parmesan. So filling. Can be gluten-free, nut-free. Soy-free Vegan Dairy-free Recipe.

recipeIngredient: 15 oz can cannellini beans (or other white beans or a combinationof white and kidney beans)
1/2 cup elbows or other pasta (use gluten-free if needed)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook until translucent. 4 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook until translucent. 4 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add celery, carrots and tomato and bring to a boil. 4 to 5 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Add celery, carrots and tomato and bring to a boil. 4 to 5 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the beans, zucchini, water, salt and spices and cook for 15 to 18 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the beans, zucchini, water, salt and spices and cook for 15 to 18 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1/2 cup pasta and simmer for 12 or more minutes. Taste and adjust salt, herbs and heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1/2 cup pasta and simmer for 12 or more minutes. Taste and adjust salt, herbs and heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in spinach and 2 tbsp chopped basil and simmer for another minute. Serve hot garnished with fresh basil and vegan parmesan.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in spinach and 2 tbsp chopped basil and simmer for another minute. Serve hot garnished with fresh basil and vegan parmesan.
